title.narrative: Support to Justice Sector Reform in Indonesia (SUSTAIN)

description.narrative: It aims to strengthen supreme court mechanism for justice,by strengthening the judiciary mechanism, capacity in case management and support the development of integrated system of human resource and management of supreme court.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.2.2.A.1

description.narrative: Volume of additional resources leveraged through public and private financing for the SDGs with UNDP support: Volume at national level: Public
